org.sakaiproject.tool.impl

Class ActiveToolComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sakaiproject.tool.impl.ToolComponent
      • org.sakaiproject.tool.impl.ActiveToolComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActiveToolManager, ToolManager
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActiveToolComponentTest

    public abstract class ActiveToolComponent
extends ToolComponent
implements ActiveToolManager

    ActiveToolComponent is the standard implementation of the Sakai ActiveTool API.

      • register

        public void register(Tool tool,
            javax.servlet.ServletContext context)
        Description copied from interface: ActiveToolManager
        Add this tool to the registry.
        Specified by:
        register in interface ActiveToolManager
        Parameters:
        tool - The Tool to register.
        context - The ServletContext to be attached to the tool. Only applied to the default implementation, as supplied through the XML signatures (usually via the ToolListener), or a bare Tool instance, which will be decorated. Ignored if supplying a custom ActiveTool implementation (or proxy).

      • register

        public void register(Document toolXml,
            javax.servlet.ServletContext context)
        Description copied from interface: ActiveToolManager
        Add tools in this XML DOM to the registry, using the Tool XML schema.
        Specified by:
        register in interface ActiveToolManager
        Parameters:
        toolXml - The parsed XML DOM in which tools to be added to the registry are to be found.

      • getLocalizedToolProperty

        public String getLocalizedToolProperty(String toolId,
                              String key)
        Get optional Localized Tool Properties (i.e. tool title, description)
        Specified by:
        getLocalizedToolProperty in interface ActiveToolManager
        Parameters:
        toolId - The fully qualified id of a sakai tool.
        key - The name of the property, for example title or description.
        Returns:
        The tool property, null if tool id is invalid.

      • getActiveTool

        public ActiveTool getActiveTool(String id)
        Description copied from interface: ActiveToolManager
        Find a tool with this well known id in the registry.
        Specified by:
        getActiveTool in interface ActiveToolManager
        Parameters:
        id - The tool's well known id.
        Returns:
        The Tool object that has this id, or null if not found.
